_header: O Father of high majesty / The Son and Holy Ghost with Thee
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Trinity — six quatrains (aabb) including refrain, ‘Te deum laudamus’ and burden: ‘Dulciter pangamus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O fader of high maiesteThe sonne and holigoos with
                    the…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Of whose kingdome noon ende shall beTe deum
                    laudamus

Zupitza,  Julius,

         89 (1892): 167-338: 243-4.

             The Early English Carols.

            1977: 201-2; 1977, 177-8.
